main event: A deputy sheriff reported seeing a bright white light that hovered and then moved upwards on 13 May 1952.
interesting points: The light was described as being the size of a balloon., The nearest launch point for a balloon was identified as 30 miles SW of Hiland., The observation lasted for 5-10 minutes., The sighting appeared to be southwest over Cain Springs, California., The report concludes with a possibility of the object being a balloon.
